TEXT: The applicants are NORP nationals , born in DATE and DATE respectively and living in GPE . They are represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE . They are detained in ORG in GPE in view of their deportation to GPE .
s , may be summarised as follows .

The applicants were arrested in GPE on DATE for detention of drugs and sale of forged CD records . PERSON declared that he had arrived in GPE DATE to study Philosophy in ORG . Mr PERSON stated that he was a NORP national . However , the police discovered that they had used forged documents and illegally entered into the country . In his testimony to the police , PERSON alleged , inter alia , that there was a risk for his life if deported to GPE , because he was a NORP and because of the conflict between NORP and NORP there , which resulted in the death of CARDINAL of his brothers and his sister DATE . The applicants were brought before ORG of GPE and tried by virtue of immediate summary proceedings ( ie where no further investigations are required ) : Mr PERSON on DATE and Mr Eziobou on DATE . The ORG sentenced Mr PERSON to CARDINAL days’ imprisonment , convertible into a pecuniary penalty and Mr Eziobou to CARDINAL months’ imprisonment . ORG also ordered their immediate expulsion . Since DATE and until DATE , the applicants have both been detained at the police station in GPE in a small cell ( QUANTITY CARDINAL m ) and fed once DATE . DATE , they were transferred in the police headquarters in GPE , in view of their deportation to GPE .
